column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My wife and I love this spot and come here for date nights as often as possible. Truly a great atmosphere and staff is always great. We had one instance where we felt sick after eating (we had the exact same dish
column2: and same drinks minus one where she had a glass of wine and I had Bourbon) and the team reached out via email
column3: then followed up with a phone call. Went over all their preventative measures
column5: and made the situation right. 100% sure it was a one off scenario so no hard feelings. Handled very professionally.
